name: Maze 4D
description: This game is a 4D maze puzzle game featuring Time Trials, standard, and other modes coming soon! Compete with yourself and friends in two categories: Time and Minimum Number of Moves!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 280M Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 740 Storage: 80 MB available space
